summary: Completed testing of 3-tab layout restructure (Trading | AI Coach | Analytics) and AI conversational access to strategy performance. All features working correctly.
passed_tests: Frontend: Tab navigation exists with 3 tabs - Trading, AI Coach, Analytics (data-testids: tab-trading, tab-coach, tab-analytics)
Frontend: Tab switching works correctly between all 3 tabs
Frontend: Trading tab shows Live Trade Alerts + Trading Bot panel
Frontend: AI Coach tab shows Holdings on left, AI Command Center in middle, Market Intel + Alerts on right
Frontend: Analytics tab shows Learning Dashboard with strategy performance cards (Rubber Band SCALP, Breakout INTRADAY, Squeeze SWING)
Frontend: Analytics tab shows AI Tuning Recommendations section with 3 pending recommendations
Frontend: Analytics tab shows Apply/Dismiss buttons on each recommendation
Frontend: Analytics tab shows 'Run AI Analysis' button (data-testid: run-analysis-btn)
Frontend: Analytics tab shows Tuning History (3 entries)
Backend: GET /api/learning/strategy-stats returns 200 with success=true and per-strategy stats
Backend: Strategy stats contain: total_trades, wins, losses, win_rate, total_pnl, avg_pnl, close_reasons, timeframe
Backend: GET /api/learning/recommendations returns 200 with 3 pending recommendations
Backend: GET /api/learning/tuning-history returns 200 with 3 history entries
Backend: POST /api/assistant/chat with 'how are my strategies performing' returns actual strategy performance data
Backend: POST /api/assistant/chat with 'any tuning recommendations' references actual pending recommendations
Backend: Scheduler is started on server startup (log shows 'Learning loop scheduler started')
critical_code_review_comments: Tab navigation implemented correctly in CommandCenterPage.js with activeMainTab state and data-testids
LearningDashboard.jsx correctly displays strategy cards with color-coded timeframe badges (SCALP=orange, INTRADAY=yellow, SWING=cyan)
AI assistant service correctly includes learning context when user asks performance-related questions (section 8 keywords detection)
Strategy performance service start_scheduler() correctly starts on app startup via asyncio.create_task()
Scheduler checks every 30 seconds and triggers auto-analysis at 4:15 PM ET on weekdays

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All 3 tabs functional with correct content

seed_data_creation: Existing data: rubber_band=15 trades, breakout=7 trades, squeeze=8 trades, 3 pending recommendations, 3 tuning history entries
context_for_next_testing_agent: 3-tab UI layout verified working: Trading (Live Alerts + Bot), AI Coach (Holdings/AI Command/Alerts), Analytics (Learning Dashboard). AI chat correctly responds to strategy performance questions using get_learning_summary_for_ai() from perf_service. Scheduler runs post-market auto-analysis at 4:15 PM ET (visible in startup logs). All data-testids working: tab-trading, tab-coach, tab-analytics, learning-dashboard, run-analysis-btn, recommendations-section.

tab_navigation.trading_tab: Working - Shows Live Trade Alerts + Trading Bot panel
tab_navigation.coach_tab: Working - Shows Holdings (left), AI Command Center (middle), Market Intel + Alerts (right)
tab_navigation.analytics_tab: Working - Shows Learning Dashboard with strategy cards, recommendations, tuning history

learning_dashboard.strategy_cards: Working - Rubber Band (SCALP), Breakout (INTRADAY), Squeeze (SWING) with win rate bars, P&L, stats
learning_dashboard.recommendations_section: Working - 3 pending recommendations with Apply/Dismiss buttons
learning_dashboard.tuning_history: Working - 3 entries showing breakout trail_pct changes

ai_conversational_access.performance_query: Working - 'how are my strategies performing' returns actual stats from MongoDB
ai_conversational_access.tuning_query: Working - 'any tuning recommendations' references pending recommendations

scheduler.schedule: 4:15 PM ET weekdays (won't fire during testing)

backend_apis.GET /api/learning/strategy-stats: 200 OK - Returns 3 strategies with full metrics
backend_apis.POST /api/assistant/chat: 200 OK - Returns contextual strategy performance responses
